DOC.brief_summary: Argon laser trabeculoplasty ( ALT ) 100 m pulse effective therapy lower intraocular pressure ( IOP ) . Similar reduction IOP achieve use n ( SLT ) microsecond ( MLT ) pulse , produce less thermal damage trabecular meshwork ( TM ) . Lack clinically visible change may make accurate alignment subsequent pulse difficult . We describe novel technique - Patterned Laser Trabeculoplasty ( PLT ) use PASCAL Photocoagulator system , preliminary evaluation patient open angle glaucoma .
DOC.criteria: 18yearold patient Uncontrolled Open angle ( Shaffer IV ) No previous surgical trabeculoplasty glaucoma surgery Patients willing participate Angleclosure glaucoma No clear optical medium
